mapper.select: SELECT c.conf_id, c.user_id, c.dept_id, c.title, c.location, c.date, c.word_file_name, c.status, c.reject_reason, u.user_name as userName, u.email as userEmail, d.dept_name FROM conference c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON c.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY c.conf_id DESC

SELECT c.conf_id, c.user_id, c.dept_id, c.title, c.location, c.date, c.word_file_name, c.status, c.reject_reason, u.user_name as userName, u.email as userEmail, d.dept_name FROM conference c LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON c.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE c.status = #{status} ORDER BY c.conf_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE conference SET status = #{status} WHERE conf_id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conference WHERE status = #{status}
